channel.title: Anyone ahve a tut to make a npc fight another npc?
channel.description: hello im looking for a tut that makes one kind of npc fight another kind sort of like the gnome battle feild in normal runescape. I use testscape (highly modifyed version of cheesescape). If anyone has a tut can you post link on here (so you know i tryed serch and there was no tut for it) thank you

item.title: Anyone ahve a tut to make a npc fight another npc?
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

there was one before but it got delted about 4 days ago (looks cross)
